text: Sohaagi Sindoor was a Bengali Soap Opera that premiered on January 18, 2016, and aired on Colors Bangla.It was produced by Chayabani Balaji. It started Ronita Das and Souptik Chakravorty in lead roles and Mallika Ghosh as the main antagonist. ==References== http://www.newstechcafe.com/2016/01/sohagi-sindoor- colors-bangla-upcoming.html#axzz57TE71JnA Category:2016 Indian television series debuts
title: Sohaagi Sindoor
